name: Waterdeep - Stabz the Goblin
description:
Moving on from his past as a low-level monster, Stabz the goblin wants to settle down and assimilate into society. He's scored a job as a baker's apprentice, and is excited for his first day onthe job.

He faces alienation from the citizens who only see him as an enemy, but can he change their preconceptions of him by saving the city of Waterdeep from his old warband when they attack?

Grey NPC – non interactable

Yellow NPC – quest giver

Blue NPC – interactable NPC

Red NPC – enemy

Purple NPC – decision-based NPC
